answers.author: Pooja Varma
answers.text:
Hi Angelo,
A similar question was asked on the KN a couple of weeks ago, that contains advice and discussion from our members for people interested in working in the public sector, which should be beneficial to you.  
Graduate In Need of Career Advise http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/questions/kn/Question/21019/Graduate_In_Need_of_Career_Advice 
The KN’s In the Know also featured a blog on the topic, “Career Advise for the Aspiring City Manager” that you may want to look at. http://icma.org/en/blog/26
I hope this is helpful, 
Pooja 
International City/County Management Association
Knowledge Network Intern
pvarma@icma.org

author: Angelo Cianfrocco
text: I am looking for suggestions on how to enter a Public carreer ?  My present employment is changing due to  changes in the space program.   I am a mature male with a Master's of Public Administration, and a B.S.B.A management.  I have experience with conducting meetings, organizing volunteers, leadership, coaching, total quality management and quality cerifications, I'm familiar with developing a budget as well as performing as a finance manager for a non profit organization.   My present postition is Quality Assurance and Lead Auditor for process auditing to ISO standards.
title: Entry into an Administration Role.
